text: Belize competed in the 2019 Pan American Games in Lima, Peru from July 26 to August 11, 2019. On July 19, 2019, the Belize team of six athletes (three per gender) was announced. Triathlete Jordan Santos was the country's flag bearer during the opening ceremony. ==Competitors== The following is the list of number of competitors (per gender) participating at the games per sport/discipline. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! width=140|Sport ! width=55|Men ! width=55|Women ! width=55|Total |- | align=left|Athletics (track and field) | 0 ||1 ||1 |- | align=left|Bodybuilding | 1 ||0 ||1 |- | align=left|Canoeing | 1 ||2||3 |- | align=left|Triathlon | 1 ||0 ||1 |- !
